column5: We usually stay in Dryden at the Best Western but I was wondering if there are any hotels in Vermillion Bay or Perrault Falls. We boat in to camp from Perrault Falls on a Saturday so we would be staying on a Friday night. Or are there any resorts that would let us stay for a evening? Scott
I stayed in the Holiday Inn Express in Dryden two weeks ago - much better than the Best Western or the Comfort Inn. I don't recall any places in Vermilion.
We stay at the Northside motel in Vermillion Bay. Nice and clean.Good food at the corner restaurant. The motel # is 807, 227 5339

Best Western in Dryden is nice but way over priced compared to the Holiday Inn Express... Depending on what your looking for... Dryden has LOTS of clean/basic rooms at a good rate if trying to save acouple bucks....
try:http://www.yellowpages.ca/business/O...adid=&stype=si nice place with a good restaurant. phish
does that holiday inn express have a pool? i can still cancel my room at the best western
